Course Information

Teaching team:

TAs Heather Hardan hhardan@uchicago.edu Room

Class meetings:

  • Lectures: Mondays and Wednesdays, 1:30pm - 2:20pm, ROOM TBA
  • Labs: Friday
    • 1:30pm - 2:20pm - ROOM TBA - TA: TBA

Office Hours:

Instructor Day / time Location
Professor Yurovsky Mon 4:00pm - 5:30pm Green 201
Heather Hardan Mon 9:30am - 11:30am ROOM

Required materials:

  • Textbook: OpenIntro Statistics with Randomization and Simulation - Diez, Barr, Çetinkaya-Rundel
    CreateSpace, 1st Edition, 2014 (ISBN: 978-1500576691)
    The textbook is freely available online. You’re welcomed to read on screen or print it out. If you prefer a paperback version you can buy it at the cost of printing (around $10) on Amazon. The textbook store will not carry copies of this text.

  • Software: The R programming language, and RStudio – a development environment for the R language.
    Both are free and open source.
